name: Nora Ephron
description:
July 14, 1989Des Moines, Iowa
Dear Diary,

I just came back from When Harry Met Sally... Meg Ryan was so lovely! Oh, to move to New York... to meet my own Harry! To love! To live! I'm gonna do it, diary, I'm gonna do it! I'll have what she is having!

Excited, Jessica
June 25, 1993Des Moines, Iowa
Dear Diary,

I cannot fall asleep... I guess I am Sleepless... in Des Moines! Oh, dear diary, I've had an awakening! Meg Ryan did it again! Tomorrow morning, I'm gonna start packing for New York! Maybe I'll meet my destiny at the top of the Empire State Building...

Hopeful, Jessica
December 18, 1998Des Moines, Iowa
Dear Diary,

It looks like I've Got Mail! Oh, it's just AOL asking me to renew my account... LOL! Anyway, luved Meg Ryan! This time, I'm doing it! I'm moving to New York! :-) Goodbye, boring, boring Iowa, hello Big Apple!!! :-) :-) :-)

LOL, jessica4040@aol.com
August 7, 2009Des Moines, Iowa
Dear Diary,

Alright, Nora Ephron. What gives? I've been waiting for over 10 years! Is it too much to ask? Oh, sure, Julie & Julia was lots of fun, and it was partly set in New York... But where are the quirky, somewhat handsome yet obtainable, men? Where is romance? And, most importantly, where is Meg Ryan?

Still waiting, Jessica


.c {font-family: cursive;}
.r {text-align: right;}
